channel.title: Heroes of Krynn UA
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Heroes of Krynn UA"

item.title: Re: Heroes of Krynn UA
item.content:encoded: Thanks for adding everything to frontpage. Everything should be complete now :)

item.title: Re: Heroes of Krynn UA
item.content:encoded:
I went ahead and added all the links to the main page, even for the pages that aren't built yet.

Thanks for taking care of this so quickly!

item.title: Heroes of Krynn UA
item.content:encoded:
New UA just dropped, so there's new stuff to add. I'll be posting the links to the pages I make for them here.

Races/Lineages:
Kender race - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/kender-ua

Subclasses:
Sorcerer Lunar Magic subclass - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/sorcerer:lunar-magic-ua

Backgrounds:
Knight of Solamnia - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/background:knight-of-solamnia-ua

Mage of High Sorcery - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/background:mage-of-high-sorcery-ua

Feats:
Adept of the Black Robes - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:adept-of-the-black-robes-ua

Adept of the Red Robes - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:adept-of-the-red-robes-ua

Adept of the White Robes - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:adept-of-the-white-robes-ua

Divine Communications - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:divine-communications-ua

Divinely Favored - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:divinely-favored-ua

Initiate of High Sorcery - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:initiate-of-high-sorcery-ua

Knight of the Crown - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:knight-of-the-crown-ua

Knight of the Sword - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:knight-of-the-sword-ua

Knight of the Rose - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:knight-of-the-rose-ua

Squire of Solamnia - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/feat:squire-of-solamnia-ua
